text:
Attention shoppers: Amazon Prime Day 2021 is officially here! First launched back in 2015, Prime Day has become one of the biggest sales of the year, with major markdowns on top-rated beauty and skincare products, fashion and activewear finds, electronics and tech gadgets (including Amazon home devices and its new fitness tracker), healthy home essentials, and so much more.

The two-day shopping event kicked off at midnight PT with tons of markdowns on some of the year's most wished for items. And with less than 48 hours left to shop—the sale ends tomorrow, Tuesday, June 22 at 11:59 p.m. PT—you'll want to start adding deals to your shopping cart ASAP.

Luckily, there are thousands items included from Vitamix blenders and Oral-B toothbrushes to Garmin watches and Adidas sneakers. Not to mention, one of Health readers' favorite buys of 2020, Apple AirPods, are heavily discounted again this year. In fact, so many items are marked down that identifying the truly great deals can be, well, difficult. To make your experience just a little smoother, we've created a guide to the best Prime Day health and wellness deals that are actually worth shopping, categorized by the departments you care about most: activewear, fitness trackers, headphones, comfy sneakers, healthy home goods, beauty essentials, and workout gear.

But here's the catch: The savings are so good, many items are bound to sell out quickly. You'll have to hurry if you want in on the sale prices! And remember, these discounts are only available to Amazon Prime members (so if you don't have an account yet, there's no better time than now to sign up for your free 30-day trial).
